duties_responsibilities.duty: Implement Lean Manufacturing Tools and Statistical Process Control to ensure quality in injection molding processes.
Maintain and review Process Documentation Program (PDP) to meet certification requirements.
Lead Troubleshooting and Problem Solving teams to address manufacturing quality issues.
Oversee Gage Calibration/System to ensure accuracy and reliability of measurement equipment.
Continuous evaluation and improvement of Manufacturing Quality and Manufacturing Systems.

education_certification.credential: Medical Device and/or FDA Certification preferred
